Interactive D3.js visualizations exploring demographics, population patterns, and sports analytics for exploratory data analysis.
Communicated complex demographic and regional patterns through interactive visualizations that enable exploration and discovery.

A collection of interactive data visualizations built with D3.js to explore patterns in demographics, population data, and sports analytics. These projects demonstrate the power of interactive visualization for exploratory analysis and communicating insights.

## Projects

- **DC Demographics**: Interactive visualization exploring demographic patterns across Washington, D.C.
- **Wizards Scoring**: Analysis of Washington Wizards scoring patterns and game performance
- **Virginia Demographics**: Interactive map and charts exploring demographic data across Virginia counties

Each visualization uses D3.js to create responsive, interactive experiences that allow users to explore the data dynamically. The focus is on making complex datasets accessible and discoverable through thoughtful design and interaction patterns.

For more D3 projects, visit my [bl.ocks page](http://bl.ocks.org/PH13).

Interactive Shiny application for exploring and analyzing futbol league data with filtering, visualization, and statistical insights.
Enabled interactive exploration of league data with intuitive filtering and visualization capabilities.

An interactive Shiny application that allows users to explore and analyze futbol league data through dynamic filtering, visualization, and statistical analysis. The application provides an intuitive interface for discovering patterns and insights in sports data.

## Features

- Interactive data filtering and selection
- Dynamic visualizations of player and team statistics
- Statistical summaries and comparisons
- User-friendly interface for non-technical users

This project demonstrates the value of interactive dashboards for exploratory data analysis and making complex datasets accessible to a broader audience.

Text prediction application with machine learning
Built an end-to-end text prediction application using natural language processing and machine learning, deployed as an interactive Shiny app.
Demonstrated practical application of NLP and ML techniques in an interactive, user-facing application.

A capstone project that built a complete text prediction application using natural language processing and machine learning techniques. The application processes large text corpora, builds predictive models, and provides real-time text prediction through an interactive Shiny interface.

## Approach

The project involved data collection and preprocessing of large text datasets, feature engineering for n-gram models, model training and evaluation, and deployment as a production-ready Shiny application. The focus was on creating a practical, usable tool that demonstrates the end-to-end ML pipeline from data to deployment.

## Technical Details

- Natural language processing for text preprocessing
- N-gram modeling for sequence prediction
- Model optimization and evaluation
- Interactive Shiny application deployment
- User interface design for real-time prediction

This project showcases the full lifecycle of an ML application, from data preparation through model development to user-facing deployment.

Automatically generated daily vertical videos summarizing world events as short poems, narrated with local TTS and assembled using MoviePy.
Demonstrates end-to-end AI automation pipeline for daily content generation.

# Daily AI News Poem Generator An autonomous AI pipeline that transforms daily world news into engaging vertical video poems, running unattended every morning at 8:00 AM EST. ## Latest Output ## Archive Under this header, we will append new video entries daily. ## 2025-12-09 ## How It Works **1. OpenAI generates news summary** → Extracts key events from daily headlines **2. OpenAI converts summary → 3 stanzas** → Structures content into poetic format **3. Piper TTS narrates each stanza** → Synthesizes natural-sounding speech locally **4. MoviePy assembles a vertical video** → Combines audio, captions, and visuals into MP4 ## Tech Stack - Python - OpenAI GPT-4o-mini - Piper TTS - MoviePy - Cron scheduling - GitHub Pages hosting ## Architecture ``` ┌─────────────┐ ┌─────────────┐ ┌─────────────┐ ┌─────────────┐ │ OpenAI │ --> │ OpenAI │ --> │ Piper TTS │ --> │ MoviePy │ │ Summary │ │ 3 Stanzas │ │ Narration │ │ Video │ └─────────────┘ └─────────────┘ └─────────────┘ └─────────────┘ ``` ## Why This Project Matters - **Demonstrates end-to-end AI pipeline engineering** — From data ingestion to multimedia output - **Real daily automation with scheduling + publishing** — Production-ready reliability and CI/CD integration - **Production-quality multimodal output** — Text, audio, and video orchestration in a single system ## Source Code

Daily AI News Poem Generator

An autonomous AI pipeline that transforms daily world news into engaging vertical video poems, running unattended every morning at 8:00 AM EST.

Latest Output

Archive

Under this header, we will append new video entries daily.

2025-12-09

How It Works

1. OpenAI generates news summary → Extracts key events from daily headlines

2. OpenAI converts summary → 3 stanzas → Structures content into poetic format

3. Piper TTS narrates each stanza → Synthesizes natural-sounding speech locally

4. MoviePy assembles a vertical video → Combines audio, captions, and visuals into MP4

Tech Stack

  • Python
  • OpenAI GPT-4o-mini
  • Piper TTS
  • MoviePy
  • Cron scheduling
  • GitHub Pages hosting

Architecture

┌─────────────┐     ┌─────────────┐     ┌─────────────┐     ┌─────────────┐
│   OpenAI    │ --> │   OpenAI    │ --> │ Piper TTS   │ --> │  MoviePy    │
│  Summary    │     │  3 Stanzas  │     │  Narration  │     │   Video     │
└─────────────┘     └─────────────┘     └─────────────┘     └─────────────┘

Why This Project Matters

  • Demonstrates end-to-end AI pipeline engineering — From data ingestion to multimedia output
  • Real daily automation with scheduling + publishing — Production-ready reliability and CI/CD integration
  • Production-quality multimodal output — Text, audio, and video orchestration in a single system

## Writing Sample

I've also written technical reports for business and strategic planning contexts. For example, I prepared a report on drones and their applications for electric cooperatives for the Business Development and Strategies Department at the [National Rural Electric Cooperative Association](http://www.nreca.coop/). This work demonstrates the ability to translate technical concepts into actionable business insights.
